channel.title: When i click run it shuts down
channel.description: whenever i download a client and extract to my desktop i open the folder and click the "run" icon. now from there it does one of 2 things either the box apears and disapers in a split second or it says " 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . ." what is the problem and what can i do to fix it? :confused:

item.title: When i click run it shuts down
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Download JDK and set your environmental variables.

Read full topic
item.source: When i click run it shuts down

@JoshieKins wrote:

whenever i download a client and extract to my desktop i open the folder and click the “run” icon. now from there it does one of 2 things either the box apears and disapers in a split second or it says " ‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue . . ." what is the problem and what can i do to fix it?
